package.name: lego_mcp_agv
package.description:
LEGO MCP AGV (Automated Guided Vehicle) Package
Provides fleet management and control for Alvik robots with ESP32 and micro-ROS for material transport in the LEGO manufacturing factory cell.
Features: - Alvik driver node (micro-ROS interface) - Fleet manager for multiple AGVs - Task allocation and scheduling - Nav2 integration for autonomous navigation - Waypoint management - Material transport coordination
